bibl.title: Approaching Late Antiquity. The Transformation from Early to Late Empire

bibl.seg: GARNSEY Peter, Roman Citizenship and Roman Law in the Late Empire.
Simon SWAIN and Mark EDWARDS (Edd.), Approaching Late Antiquity. The Transformation from Early to Late Empire (Oxford, 2004) pp. 133-155.

I. Introduction. - II. Citizenship before the edict of Caracalla. - III. Citizenship after the edict of Caracalla. - IV. Roman law and local law after Caracalla. - V. Civitas Romana and civitas Dei. - VI. Conclusion.
